alert.note: Alert for Lafayette (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 9:48AM CDT until August 02 at 7:36PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Missouri, north central Missouri and west central Missouri, including the following counties, in central Missouri, Saline. In north central Missouri, Carroll. In west central Missouri, Lafayette. * WHEN...Until 100 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 946 AM CDT, Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen across the advisory area. Heavy rain has ended, but flooding concerns may linger through early afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Marshall, Carrollton, Waverly, Norborne, Malta Bend, Blackburn, Mount Leonard and Grand Pass. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
